## BndResponsePatternTU

### BndResponsePatternTU Globally
```
Globally, it is always the case that if "R" holds for at least "c0" time units, then "Q" holds afterwards
```
```
true;⌈R⌉ ∧ ℓ ≥ 50;⌈!Q⌉;true
```
